body: 结局留的伏笔还行，算是给这个烂俗ntr故事找回一点点分数。

It is not a bad story after all despite having the same cliches of the genre (Sex god with a big cock > Virgin loser with a small penis). However, the epilogue seemed very simple to me. It feels as if the author put it at the last minute and just to comply. Although it is appreciated that at least it has an epilogue, 90% of the ntr does not even have it.
FMC even drug her BF for fuck with ex but in the end he find out and brake up.

Looks like ex and FMC fucked, she got caught, cried and apologized, then MC and FMC divorced. The girl at the end is a different girl and she says that the penis stuff isn’t what makes a man and she loves him. He’s scared that someone else will come and steal this girl too. Ex wife is pregnant.

Sad I don't understand a thing.
but still noice
